(sorry about the delay)
yes, there's an issue with the flash plugin causing firefox crashes if it's routed through pulseaudio
so that functionality is disabled right now

you can install libflashsupport, and then remove and reinstall the flashplugin, and that'll make it share the audio device, but you get occasional crashes (although they're more annoying than damaging, due to the session restoring that firefox has)
btw, hdparm cached will be referring to the kernel cache afaik, not the actual drive cache
doing an uncached speed test for a very small amount, and then doing it again before accessing anything else, should give you more representative numbers
